title: Are you an entrepreneur addressing global challenges? Apply for the Extreme Tech Challenge by March 15 - YourStory
content: Are you an entrepreneur addressing global challenges? Apply for the Extreme Tech Challenge by March 15  YourStory
description: For a third season, the non-profit Extreme Tech Challenge (XTC) is seeking startups on every continent to join its ecosystem community and annual pitch competition. XTC focuses on advancing recognition and investment in high-return businesses doing responsible innovation
